completed.title: Didn't get an email?
completed.sub: If you don't see an email from us within an few minutes, a few things could have happened:

items.spamFolder: The email is on your spam folder.
items.mistakeEmail: The email address you entered had a mistake or typo.
items.anotherEmail: You accidentally gave us another email address.
items.cantDeliver: We can't deliver the email on this address.

completed.reenterEmail: Re-enter your email and try again
